sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — The Democratic Party’s endorsed candidate for governor of Pennsylvania, state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, headed into 2022 with $13.4 million in his campaign account, a state record for a candidate heading into an election year.
author: Marc Levy
title: Shapiro sets campaign cash record to start election year

sentence: I can feel our campaign’s momentum growing by the day, and I know we are ready to take on and defeat career politician Josh Shapiro this November.” Shapiro, Pennsylvania’s attorney general, is the presumed Democratic gubernatorial nominee.
title: Last of GOP regional straw polls hand victories to Bartos, White for U.S. Senate, governor

sentence: The Fox News poll did not include Democratic candidates with the party backing Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania Governor race a virtual tie; Fox News poll

sentence: HARRISBURG, Pa. (WHTM/AP) — A massive Republican primary field for governor in Pennsylvania is spurring growing discomfort among party leaders that a widely splintered primary vote could produce a winner who cannot beat Democrat Josh Shapiro in November’s general election.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania’s big GOP primary field for governor has party leaders worried

author: Kenny Cooper
title: Delco unveils plan to address kids’ mental health crisis made ‘catastrophically worse’ during pandemic

sentence: The winner of the May 17 primary will take on state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who is running unopposed in the Democratic primary.
author: Brian X. McCrone
title: Call with Trump Leads Pa. GOP Candidate to Stay in Race for Governor

sentence: Democrat Josh Shapiro, who is running unopposed, has $12 million more cash on hand than all nine Republican candidates combined.
author: George Stockburger
title: Pennsylvania Governor race: Shapiro & White lead Q1 fundraising
